embed.title: 👋 Welcome, %USER!
embed.description:
Greetings, brave traveler, and thank you for stepping into our realm. We're thrilled to have you join our fellowship of gamers and adventurers. Whether you're a seasoned warrior or just starting your journey, you've found a place to call home.

♤ *Learn more in* <#1161517513255956520>


♦️ **Next Steps** ♦️

To commence your adventure in this glorious server, simply use the command:

`/get-started`

and follow the instructions provided. This will guide you through the essential steps to immerse yourself in our gaming community and join in the fun.

May your journey with Founding Sons Gaming be filled with epic encounters, lasting friendships, and unforgettable gaming moments. Welcome to the beginning of your exciting quest! 🧙‍♂️ 🕹️

replacements.name: user
replacements.description: The username of the message recipient.
